parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2oa

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.60

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Positions

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Normal_(geometry) surface normal] on given position.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''surfaceNormal''' position

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> position: [[Array]] - format [[Position2D]] or [[Position3D]] in which case Z will be ignored

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] - Example: [-0.102321,0.19977,0.974486]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_normal <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>=</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext> [[surfaceNormal]] [300, 500];</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_normal <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>=</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext> [[surfaceNormal]] [[position]] [[player]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[setVectorUp]], [[surfaceIsWater]], [[surfaceType]]
</value></part></template>


[[Category:Scripting Commands|<template><title>uc:<template><title>PAGENAME</title></template></title></template>]]
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma2</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
